page.title: 20FLIXTON'S GOLF COURSE
page.content: I play golf at William Rowe Municipal Golf Course. I'm not very good as I've only been playing for four or five months, but I've already met most of the characters who play there. I often play with my Dad or two of my mates. My Dad is away a lot with the Navy and so has Four weeks of non-stop golf and four without any. He's the sort who hates playing in bad weather. He gets really mad with himself when he makes an error or gets a bad score. He usually blames it on his wood, which is the club he tees off with. I like this because when he played really badly a few weeks ago, he sold me his wood for a fiver! Then there's Mark and Darren. Mark must be really cool and patient, Because when he makes a mistake he just grunts. When Darren or I make mistakes though, the course is no place for a vicar.
